title: Central Bank summoned before Committee on Public Finance tomorrow
body_lines: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) has been summoned before the Committee on Public Finance tomorrow (24) at 10.00 a.m.

The Committee on Public Finance, chaired by Anura Priyadarshana Yapa, recently decided to summon the Governor of the Central Bank, the Secretary to the Ministry of Finance and other officials to discuss the prevailing economic situation and solutions, Department of Communications of Parliament said.
